message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic product at the price of $9,000. I think it's a fair deal considering its value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to share this product. I am interested in purchasing it, but I can only pay $8,500. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for a price closer to $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $8,750?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $8,600. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us.
